## Description {#details}

Lowers thread local variables on the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/xcore">XCore</a>.

Each thread local variable is expanded to an array of n elements indexed by the thread ID where n is the fixed number hardware threads supported by the device.

Definition at line 41 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcorelowerthreadlocal-cpp">XCoreLowerThreadLocal.cpp</a>.
